title: Lakers governor Jeanie Buss talks year of transition, says father would have supported sale to Mark Walter
summary_full: Los Angeles Lakers governor Jeanie Buss said new majority owner Mark Walter's access to capital will help the team best compete with the NBA's top franchises.
summary_public: Los Angeles Lakers governor Jeanie Buss said new majority owner Mark Walter's access to capital will help the team best compete with the NBA's top franchises.
